objective: Generate frontend component boilerplate with proper structure, props, and types.
instructions: 1. Analyze the component requirements from wireframes/designs. 2. Create component file with proper structure (React/Vue/Svelte as appropriate). 3. Define TypeScript interfaces for props and state. 4. Implement basic component skeleton with placeholder content. 5. Add proper prop validation and default values. 6. Include basic styling setup (CSS modules, styled-components, or Tailwind). 7. Add JSDoc/TSDoc comments for documentation. 8. Create accompanying test file stub.
component_structure: - Props interface with documentation - State management (useState, useReducer, or store bindings) - Event handlers with proper typing - Render logic with conditional rendering patterns - CSS/styling approach consistent with project - Export statement (named or default as per convention)
output_format: Generate files including: - Component file (ComponentName.tsx) - Types file if complex (ComponentName.types.ts) - Styles file (ComponentName.module.css or ComponentName.styles.ts) - Test stub (ComponentName.test.tsx) - Storybook story (ComponentName.stories.tsx) if applicable
